data.title: Donna Summer
data.text:
AKA LaDonna Adrian Gaines

Born: 31-Dec-1948

Birthplace: Boston, MA

Died: 17-May-2012

Location of death: Englewood, FL

Cause of death: Cancer - Lung

Remains: Buried, Harpeth Hills Memory Gardens, Nashville, TN

Gender: Female

Religion: Christian

Race or Ethnicity: Black

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Singer

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Hot Stuff

Father: Andrew Gaines

Mother: Mary Ellen Davis Gaines (d.)

Sister: Jeanette

Brother: Ricky

Sister: Linda

Sister: Amy

Sister: Mary Anna (younger)

Husband: Helmut Summer (div. circa 1974, one daughter)

Daughter: Mimi Summer (b. 1974)

Husband: Bruce Sudano (m. 16-Jul-1980, two daughters)

Daughter: Brooklyn Sudano (b. 1981)

Daughter: Amanda Sudano (b. 11-Aug-1982)

High School: (dropped out)

Donna Summer

Grammy 5

Wedding: Donald Trump and Melania Knauss (2005)

Suicide Attempt

Risk Factors: Depression

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Off the Menu: The Last Days of Chasen's (Oct-1997) Â· Herself

Thank God It's Friday (19-May-1978)

http://www.donnasummer.com/

Author of books:
